data.title: Sunny Spring Halo - Petite
data.meta_description: *Petite Backdrops are best used as lay-flats for newborns in props photographing overhead. They are also fantastic for wedding photographers for detail shots!* WRINKLE  FREE FABRIC BACKDROPS: No more wrinkles! Our new wrinkle resistant fabric is the next generation in backdrops- pull tight for a smooth finish. FLEECE B
data.text:
*Petite Backdrops are best used as lay-flats for newborns in props photographing overhead. They are also fantastic for wedding photographers for detail shots!*

WRINKLE FREE FABRIC BACKDROPS: No more wrinkles! Our new wrinkle resistant fabric is the next generation in backdrops- pull tight for a smooth finish.

FLEECE BACKDROPS: This soft fleece is a thick sweatshirt material, hemmed around the edges and soft to the touch! Fleece add a cost-effective portable option, with less stretch than our fabrics, but added vibrance and the same durability and portability that you already love. Smooth in appearance.

POLY PAPER BACKDROPS: High quality blended poly paper, non-reflective surface & excellent print/color quality.

*Limited time only* ULTRA-STRETCH FABRIC BACKDROPS in 60x50" XL Petites: This backdrop is made from a polyester spandex material and is ultra stretchy with hemmed edges! Backdrop may lose up to 3-4 inches total on all sides due to hemmed edges.

CARE: Fabric & Fleece backdrops are machine washable (wash in cold water only) & can be placed in the dryer on low heat. All fabric backdrops can be folded and stacked for easy storage and transporting.

Prior to using: You may use a steamer or place in the dryer with a damp washcloth for 10 minutes using low heat to remove any crease lines.

Poly Paper Backdrops must be stored rolled or hung. Allow to air dry if it becomes wet or soiled. Gently dab wet area first using a soft cloth (do not wipe/scrub/rub). Use painters tape with caution.

SHIPPING: Backdrops are made to order & will ship out within 1-2 weeks via USPS Priority.

Exchanges/Refunds: Each backdrop is made to order, therefore we do not accept exchanges/refunds. However, if you would like to upgrade or you ordered the incorrect size/design, you may exchange the unused backdrop.
